name: dermitza
body:
# about

My name is Konstantinos Dermitzakis and I was born in the town of [Agios Nikolaos, Crete](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Agios_Nikolaos,_Crete) on March 16th 1984. I have lived in [Edinburgh, Scotland](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Edinburgh) from September 2001 to 2006. There, I finished my undergraduate studies and obtained a BSc with Honours in [Computer Science](http://www.ed.ac.uk/schools-departments/informatics/) from the [University of Edinburgh](University of Edinburgh). I also completed my MSc studies in [Artificial Intelligence](http://www.ed.ac.uk/schools-departments/informatics/) at the same university. I have been a research associate at the [Artificial Intelligence Lab](http://www.ifi.uzh.ch/ailab.html) at the [University of Zurich](http://www.uzh.ch/) since 2007, where I also obtained my PhD degree.


# projects

Some open source projects (mechanical and electronics hardware) designed and developed during my stay at the AI Lab, UZH.

* The [microPower](http://dermitza.github.io/microPower/) power supply
* The [bigMama](http://dermitza.github.io/bigMama/) constant current breakout
* The [roboShieldMega](http://dermitza.github.io/roboShieldMega/), an arduino mega robot shield
* The [demoPuppy](http://dermitza.github.io/demoPuppy/), a miniature robot puppy

# Contact
Konstantinos Dermitzakis (@dermitza).
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
